Nej detta är Drunken Master 2. The Legend of Drunken Master är nån titel som amerikanarna satt på den. Ettan heter alltså bara Drunken Master.

er dette den usensurerte version av drunken master 2? den som blev released på dvd i europa er ikke den usensurerte version... hvis denne er dvd-rip med engelsk dubbing så finnes den ikke like bra som originalen som er u-klippet... det er så stor  forskjell at den da ikke lengre er jackie chan's beste film.

fckhead i'm pretty sure this is the dubbed and cencored version of this movie.. If it's the dvd release called "legend of drunken master" then it is. and I would urge everyone to get the original version of "drunken master 2" in chinese which is uncut. they even cut a bit of the story in this version, not to mention the rawest fighting...

So is this part 1 or part 2?

Very nice movie with superstar Jackie Chan.In this movie Jackie Chan impersonates Wong Fei Hung who is sent to train with his uncle, a wine guzzling master in kung fu, famous for crippling his students. Desperate to escape this brutal teacher's cruel regime, he flees but is confronted, humiliated and beaten senseless by a hired assassin whose really name is Hwang Jang lee. Now Fei Hung is hungry for revenge, ashamed and very angry returns to his drunken master....For more information go to wing-chunws/Drunken%20Master.html
